name: Garbageman
description:
Frank is a garbage man that's on a very important mission: he must keep the columns of the unstable Clock Building free of trash bags in order to prevent the building's imminent collapse. In this simple but fun arcade game, help Frank do his job and get a big score!

> Main features/characteristics:
- Simple gameplay;
- Score attack;
- Six columns to protect;
- Three kinds of presents to collect:
-> present 1: score points;
-> present 2: powerups (eg. gravity reduction, jump speed etc.);
-> present 3: special (trash bag magnet for up to 5 seconds).
- Retro-style graphics;
- High Score autosave.
